query.statement:
SELECT MAX(A.ARA) ARA, A.VKGRP, MAX(A.VKGRP_NM) VKGRP_NM, B.TGB, SUM(B.CNT_A) CNT_A, CASE WHEN SUM(B.AMT_A) = 0 OR SUM(B.CNT_A) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (SUM(B.AMT_A) / SUM(B.CNT_A)) END AMT_A, SUM(B.CNT_B) CNT_B, CASE WHEN SUM(B.AMT_B) = 0 OR SUM(B.CNT_B) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (SUM(B.AMT_B) / SUM(B.CNT_B)) END AMT_B, SUM(B.CNT_C) CNT_C, CASE WHEN SUM(B.AMT_C) = 0 OR SUM(B.CNT_C) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (SUM(B.AMT_C) / SUM(B.CNT_C)) END AMT_C, SUM(B.CNT_D) CNT_D, CASE WHEN SUM(B.AMT_D) = 0 OR SUM(B.CNT_D) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (SUM(B.AMT_D) / SUM(B.CNT_D)) END AMT_D, SUM(B.CNT_E) CNT_E, CASE WHEN SUM(B.AMT_E) = 0 OR SUM(B.CNT_E) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (SUM(B.AMT_E) / SUM(B.CNT_E)) END AMT_E, SUM(B.CNT_F) CNT_F, CASE WHEN SUM(B.AMT_F) = 0 OR SUM(B.CNT_F) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (SUM(B.AMT_F) / SUM(B.CNT_F)) END AMT_F, SUM(B.CNT_G) CNT_G, CASE WHEN SUM(B.AMT_G) = 0 OR SUM(B.CNT_G) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE (SUM(B.AMT_G) / SUM(B.CNT_G)) END AMT_G FROM ( SELECT A.ARA, A.ARA_NM, A.VKGRP, A.VKGRP_NM FROM ( SELECT A.CODE2 ARA, A.CTEXT2 ARA_NM, B.VKGRP, B.VKGRP_NM FROM SAPHEE.ZLCODE A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CODE2 = B.BSU_ARA AND A.CODE1 = 'CS115' AND A.CODE2 <> 'E1' AND A.LANG = #G_LANG# AND B.LGORT > '' AND B.VKGRP > '' AND B.VKGRP <> '218'
AND B.BSU_ARA = #ARA#
GROUP BY A.CODE2, A.CTEXT2, B.VKGRP, B.VKGRP_NM
UNION ALL
SELECT 'XX' ARA, 'ÃÑÇÕ°è' ARA_NM, 'XX' VKGRP, 'ÃÑÇÕ°è' VKGRP_NM FROM SYSIBM.SYSDUMMY1 ) A ORDER BY A.ARA, A.VKGRP ) A, ( SELECT B.VKGRP, MAX(B.VKGRP_NM) VKGRP_NM, CASE A.CS126_TGB WHEN '1' THEN 'Á÷¿µ' WHEN '3' THEN 'Çù·Â' END TGB, COUNT(*) CNT_A, 0 CNT_B, 0 CNT_C, 0 CNT_D, 0 CNT_E, 0 CNT_F, 0 CNT_G, SUM(A.CS126_AMT) AMT_A, 0 AMT_B, 0 AMT_C, 0 AMT_D, 0 AMT_E, 0 AMT_F, 0 AMT_G FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B, SAPHEE.ZCST111 C WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_BSU = B.LGORT AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = C.PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = C.HNO AND C.HST NOT IN ('D','F') AND C.EXC = '' AND B.LGORT > '' AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND A.CS126_TGB IN ('1','3') AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND A.CS126_KND > '' AND A.CS126_SLA = 'N' AND A.CS126_ABG = 'A' AND #DAT# BETWEEN A.CS126_USD AND A.CS126_UMR GROUP BY B.VKGRP, A.CS126_TGB
UNION ALL
SELECT B.VKGRP, MAX(B.VKGRP_NM) VKGRP_NM, CASE A.CS126_TGB WHEN '1' THEN 'Á÷¿µ' WHEN '3' THEN 'Çù·Â' END TGB, 0 CNT_A, COUNT(*) CNT_B, 0 CNT_C, 0 CNT_D, 0 CNT_E, 0 CNT_F, 0 CNT_G, 0 AMT_A, SUM(A.CS126_AMT) AMT_B, 0 AMT_C, 0 AMT_D, 0 AMT_E, 0 AMT_F, 0 AMT_G FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B, SAPHEE.ZCST111 C WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_BSU = B.LGORT AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = C.PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = C.HNO AND C.HST NOT IN ('D','F') AND C.EXC = '' AND B.LGORT > '' AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND A.CS126_TGB IN ('1','3') AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND A.CS126_KND > '' AND A.CS126_SLA = 'N' AND A.CS126_ABG = 'B' AND #DAT# BETWEEN A.CS126_USD AND A.CS126_UMR GROUP BY B.VKGRP, A.CS126_TGB
UNION ALL
SELECT B.VKGRP, MAX(B.VKGRP_NM) VKGRP_NM, CASE A.CS126_TGB WHEN '1' THEN 'Á÷¿µ' WHEN '3' THEN 'Çù·Â' END TGB, 0 CNT_A, 0 CNT_B, COUNT(*) CNT_C, 0 CNT_D, 0 CNT_E, 0 CNT_F, 0 CNT_G, 0 AMT_A, 0 AMT_B, SUM(A.CS126_AMT) AMT_C, 0 AMT_D, 0 AMT_E, 0 AMT_F, 0 AMT_G FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B, SAPHEE.ZCST111 C WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_BSU = B.LGORT AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = C.PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = C.HNO AND C.HST NOT IN ('D','F') AND C.EXC = '' AND B.LGORT > '' AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND A.CS126_TGB IN ('1','3') AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND A.CS126_KND > '' AND A.CS126_SLA = 'N' AND A.CS126_ABG IN ('A','B') AND #DAT# BETWEEN A.CS126_USD AND A.CS126_UMR GROUP BY B.VKGRP, A.CS126_TGB
UNION ALL
SELECT B.VKGRP, MAX(B.VKGRP_NM) VKGRP_NM, CASE A.CS126_TGB WHEN '1' THEN 'Á÷¿µ' WHEN '3' THEN 'Çù·Â' END TGB, 0 CNT_A, 0 CNT_B, 0 CNT_C, COUNT(*) CNT_D, 0 CNT_E, 0 CNT_F, 0 CNT_G, 0 AMT_A, 0 AMT_B, 0 AMT_C, SUM(A.CS126_AMT) AMT_D, 0 AMT_E, 0 AMT_F, 0 AMT_G FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B, SAPHEE.ZCST111 C WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_BSU = B.LGORT AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = C.PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = C.HNO AND C.HST NOT IN ('D','F') AND C.EXC = '' AND B.LGORT > '' AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND A.CS126_TGB IN ('1','3') AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND A.CS126_KND = '' AND A.CS126_SLA = 'N' AND A.CS126_ABG = 'A' AND #DAT# BETWEEN A.CS126_USD AND A.CS126_UMR GROUP BY B.VKGRP, A.CS126_TGB
UNION ALL
SELECT B.VKGRP, MAX(B.VKGRP_NM) VKGRP_NM, CASE A.CS126_TGB WHEN '1' THEN 'Á÷¿µ' WHEN '3' THEN 'Çù·Â' END TGB, 0 CNT_A, 0 CNT_B, 0 CNT_C, 0 CNT_D, COUNT(*) CNT_E, 0 CNT_F, 0 CNT_G, 0 AMT_A, 0 AMT_B, 0 AMT_C, 0 AMT_D, SUM(A.CS126_AMT) AMT_E, 0 AMT_F, 0 AMT_G FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B, SAPHEE.ZCST111 C WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_BSU = B.LGORT AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = C.PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = C.HNO AND C.HST NOT IN ('D','F') AND C.EXC = '' AND B.LGORT > '' AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND A.CS126_TGB IN ('1','3') AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND A.CS126_KND = '' AND A.CS126_SLA = 'N' AND A.CS126_ABG = 'B' AND #DAT# BETWEEN A.CS126_USD AND A.CS126_UMR GROUP BY B.VKGRP, A.CS126_TGB
UNION ALL
SELECT B.VKGRP, MAX(B.VKGRP_NM) VKGRP_NM, CASE A.CS126_TGB WHEN '1' THEN 'Á÷¿µ' WHEN '3' THEN 'Çù·Â' END TGB, 0 CNT_A, 0 CNT_B, 0 CNT_C, 0 CNT_D, 0 CNT_E, COUNT(*) CNT_F, 0 CNT_G, 0 AMT_A, 0 AMT_B, 0 AMT_C, 0 AMT_D, 0 AMT_E, SUM(A.CS126_AMT) AMT_F, 0 AMT_G FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B, SAPHEE.ZCST111 C WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_BSU = B.LGORT AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = C.PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = C.HNO AND C.HST NOT IN ('D','F') AND C.EXC = '' AND B.LGORT > '' AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND A.CS126_TGB IN ('1','3') AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND A.CS126_KND = '' AND A.CS126_SLA = 'N' AND A.CS126_ABG IN ('A','B') AND #DAT# BETWEEN A.CS126_USD AND A.CS126_UMR GROUP BY B.VKGRP, A.CS126_TGB
UNION ALL
SELECT B.VKGRP, MAX(B.VKGRP_NM) VKGRP_NM, CASE A.CS126_TGB WHEN '1' THEN 'Á÷¿µ' WHEN '3' THEN 'Çù·Â' END TGB, 0 CNT_A, 0 CNT_B, 0 CNT_C, 0 CNT_D, 0 CNT_E, 0 CNT_F, COUNT(*) CNT_G, 0 AMT_A, 0 AMT_B, 0 AMT_C, 0 AMT_D, 0 AMT_E, 0 AMT_F, SUM(A.CS126_AMT) AMT_G FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B, SAPHEE.ZCST111 C WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_BSU = B.LGORT AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = C.PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = C.HNO AND C.HST NOT IN ('D','F') AND C.EXC = '' AND B.LGORT > '' AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND A.CS126_TGB IN ('1','3') AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND ((A.CS126_KND > '' AND A.CS126_SLA = 'N') OR (A.CS126_KND = '' AND A.CS126_SLA = 'N')) AND A.CS126_ABG IN ('A','B') AND #DAT# BETWEEN A.CS126_USD AND A.CS126_UMR GROUP BY B.VKGRP, A.CS126_TGB
UNION ALL
SELECT 'XX' VKGRP, 'ÃÑÇÕ°è' VKGRP_NM, '' TGB, COUNT(*) CNT_A, 0 CNT_B, 0 CNT_C, 0 CNT_D, 0 CNT_E, 0 CNT_F, 0 CNT_G, SUM(A.CS126_AMT) AMT_A, 0 AMT_B, 0 AMT_C, 0 AMT_D, 0 AMT_E, 0 AMT_F, 0 AMT_G FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B, SAPHEE.ZCST111 C WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_BSU = B.LGORT AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = C.PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = C.HNO AND C.HST NOT IN ('D','F') AND C.EXC = '' AND B.LGORT > '' AND B.VKGRP <> '218' AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND A.CS126_TGB IN ('1','3') AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND A.CS126_KND > '' AND A.CS126_SLA = 'N' AND A.CS126_ABG = 'A' AND #DAT# BETWEEN A.CS126_USD AND A.CS126_UMR
AND B.BSU_ARA = #ARA#
UNION ALL
SELECT 'XX' VKGRP, 'ÃÑÇÕ°è' VKGRP_NM, '' TGB, 0 CNT_A, COUNT(*) CNT_B, 0 CNT_C, 0 CNT_D, 0 CNT_E, 0 CNT_F, 0 CNT_G, 0 AMT_A, SUM(A.CS126_AMT) AMT_B, 0 AMT_C, 0 AMT_D, 0 AMT_E, 0 AMT_F, 0 AMT_G FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B, SAPHEE.ZCST111 C WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_BSU = B.LGORT AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = C.PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = C.HNO AND C.HST NOT IN ('D','F') AND C.EXC = '' AND B.LGORT > '' AND B.VKGRP <> '218' AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND A.CS126_TGB IN ('1','3') AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND A.CS126_KND > '' AND A.CS126_SLA = 'N' AND A.CS126_ABG = 'B' AND #DAT# BETWEEN A.CS126_USD AND A.CS126_UMR
AND B.BSU_ARA = #ARA#
UNION ALL
SELECT 'XX' VKGRP, 'ÃÑÇÕ°è' VKGRP_NM, '' TGB, 0 CNT_A, 0 CNT_B, COUNT(*) CNT_C, 0 CNT_D, 0 CNT_E, 0 CNT_F, 0 CNT_G, 0 AMT_A, 0 AMT_B, SUM(A.CS126_AMT) AMT_C, 0 AMT_D, 0 AMT_E, 0 AMT_F, 0 AMT_G FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B, SAPHEE.ZCST111 C WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_BSU = B.LGORT AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = C.PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = C.HNO AND C.HST NOT IN ('D','F') AND C.EXC = '' AND B.LGORT > '' AND B.VKGRP <> '218' AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND A.CS126_TGB IN ('1','3') AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND A.CS126_KND > '' AND A.CS126_SLA = 'N' AND A.CS126_ABG IN ('A','B') AND #DAT# BETWEEN A.CS126_USD AND A.CS126_UMR
AND B.BSU_ARA = #ARA#
UNION ALL
SELECT 'XX' VKGRP, 'ÃÑÇÕ°è' VKGRP_NM, '' TGB, 0 CNT_A, 0 CNT_B, 0 CNT_C, COUNT(*) CNT_D, 0 CNT_E, 0 CNT_F, 0 CNT_G, 0 AMT_A, 0 AMT_B, 0 AMT_C, SUM(A.CS126_AMT) AMT_D, 0 AMT_E, 0 AMT_F, 0 AMT_G FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B, SAPHEE.ZCST111 C WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_BSU = B.LGORT AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = C.PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = C.HNO AND C.HST NOT IN ('D','F') AND C.EXC = '' AND B.LGORT > '' AND B.VKGRP <> '218' AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND A.CS126_TGB IN ('1','3') AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND A.CS126_KND = '' AND A.CS126_SLA = 'N' AND A.CS126_ABG = 'A' AND #DAT# BETWEEN A.CS126_USD AND A.CS126_UMR
AND B.BSU_ARA = #ARA#
UNION ALL
SELECT 'XX' VKGRP, 'ÃÑÇÕ°è' VKGRP_NM, '' TGB, 0 CNT_A, 0 CNT_B, 0 CNT_C, 0 CNT_D, COUNT(*) CNT_E, 0 CNT_F, 0 CNT_G, 0 AMT_A, 0 AMT_B, 0 AMT_C, 0 AMT_D, SUM(A.CS126_AMT) AMT_E, 0 AMT_F, 0 AMT_G FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B, SAPHEE.ZCST111 C WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_BSU = B.LGORT AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = C.PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = C.HNO AND C.HST NOT IN ('D','F') AND C.EXC = '' AND B.LGORT > '' AND B.VKGRP <> '218' AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND A.CS126_TGB IN ('1','3') AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND A.CS126_KND = '' AND A.CS126_SLA = 'N' AND A.CS126_ABG = 'B' AND #DAT# BETWEEN A.CS126_USD AND A.CS126_UMR
AND B.BSU_ARA = #ARA#
UNION ALL
SELECT 'XX' VKGRP, 'ÃÑÇÕ°è' VKGRP_NM, '' TGB, 0 CNT_A, 0 CNT_B, 0 CNT_C, 0 CNT_D, 0 CNT_E, COUNT(*) CNT_F, 0 CNT_G, 0 AMT_A, 0 AMT_B, 0 AMT_C, 0 AMT_D, 0 AMT_E, SUM(A.CS126_AMT) AMT_F, 0 AMT_G FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B, SAPHEE.ZCST111 C WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_BSU = B.LGORT AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = C.PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = C.HNO AND C.HST NOT IN ('D','F') AND C.EXC = '' AND B.LGORT > '' AND B.VKGRP <> '218' AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND A.CS126_TGB IN ('1','3') AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND A.CS126_KND = '' AND A.CS126_SLA = 'N' AND A.CS126_ABG IN ('A','B') AND #DAT# BETWEEN A.CS126_USD AND A.CS126_UMR
AND B.BSU_ARA = #ARA#
UNION ALL
SELECT 'XX' VKGRP, 'ÃÑÇÕ°è' VKGRP_NM, '' TGB, 0 CNT_A, 0 CNT_B, 0 CNT_C, 0 CNT_D, 0 CNT_E, 0 CNT_F, COUNT(*) CNT_G, 0 AMT_A, 0 AMT_B, 0 AMT_C, 0 AMT_D, 0 AMT_E, 0 AMT_F, SUM(A.CS126_AMT) AMT_G FROM SAPHEE.ZCST126 A, SAPHEE.ZWBT010 B, SAPHEE.ZCST111 C WHERE A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.CS126_BSU = B.LGORT AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.CS126_PJT = C.PJT AND A.CS126_HNO = C.HNO AND C.HST NOT IN ('D','F') AND C.EXC = '' AND B.LGORT > '' AND B.VKGRP <> '218' AND A.CS126_DDT = '' AND A.CS126_PST = 'A6' AND A.CS126_GND = 'D' AND A.CS126_TGB IN ('1','3') AND SUBSTR(A.CS126_HNO,1,1) NOT IN ('J','G') AND ((A.CS126_KND > '' AND A.CS126_SLA = 'N') OR (A.CS126_KND = '' AND A.CS126_SLA = 'N')) AND A.CS126_ABG IN ('A','B') AND #DAT# BETWEEN A.CS126_USD AND A.CS126_UMR
AND B.BSU_ARA = #ARA#
) B WHERE A.VKGRP = B.VKGRP GROUP BY A.VKGRP, B.TGB ORDER BY MAX(A.ARA), A.VKGRP, B.TGB WITH UR
